website_summaries.verdict: Unique handheld vac has some nice features, but the power it delivers makes it best suited for light cleaning tasks.
pros: Sports a long, flexible hose for vacuuming hard-to-reach areas
Very lightweight and almost effortless to manoeuver
Dirt bin is easy to empty

customer_reviews.title: Good but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Nice mini vac, good for cat hairs. I actually bought this last year and it stopped working just before I'd had it a year. Amazon sent me a replacement no questions asked. The only complaint is that it's a bit too noisy
customer_reviews.author: tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad little vacuum. I bought it to keep in the garage as a car vac. Whilst it is not as powerful as the old Dyson it replaced , it still does a reasonable job. For a serious clean out though it doesn’t compare against a mains fed vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: A little gem!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum. So easy to use. Great for the car too. Empties really quickly and gets into those tricky corners. Works at full power until the battery life is exhausted so no gradual loss of suction. Charges in four hours, but that's no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So handy for doing quick sweeps around the house! Not great for carpeted stairs!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker battery vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times now in my car. Battery lasts well and has plenty of suction. Really good little vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Ell

customer_reviews.title: Ideal hoover
customer_reviews.text: I LV this item easy to use very lightweight I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: sharon sutton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Turned up. Charged it. Light went out. Still does not turn on. Rtnd!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not had much use, it cut out and now it won't switch on, filters not clogged up as I checked, not happy with this considering its a black and decker
customer_reviews.author: Glyn Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and use!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for work they are really easy to use and the suction is quite good I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle

customer_reviews.title: Good for cars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone else to use on their car , they seem very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and no cord to tangle
customer_reviews.text: Mostly cleaning stairs its lightweight but the battery runs out quite quickly
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a present to my daughter who said it worked well
customer_reviews.author: alison j.lane

customer_reviews.title: Great little hover
customer_reviews.text: Great little hover, great for a quick going over and for things spilt by the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Miss C J Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion it is the best designed small hand held vacuum I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: John small

customer_reviews.title: ... charge and lasts quite a while Very lightweight Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Work well Relatively quick to charge and lasts quite a while Very lightweight Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pople

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacum, have purchased 3 so far for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen at 43

customer_reviews.title: Hand held vac
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Very light weight and surprisingly strong suction. Really good value
customer_reviews.author: barbara arnold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product, it is great when you don't need to get you hoover out.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S T Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the flexible hose is very useful in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the item we received would not recharge so we had to return it. We were otherwise impressed by the design and subsequently purchased the next model with more powerful motor. I think we just got a rogue originally. Good value for money, so worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A small compact powerful little tool we are well pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: clive brewins

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: When we first got vacuum it was able to sufficiently pick up crumbs from kitchen floor tiles though suction not terribly impressive. Had to return as we were unable to recharge it, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After one successful use, the battery would not recharge so it's been returned causing much inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Iris Howell

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Too fiddly, style over function ,filter blocks quickly, same your cash for somthing better.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not a great start
customer_reviews.text: The rechargeable unit snapped after only 4 months of limited use. Now have a replacement will see how that works
customer_reviews.author: Fi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy !
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews and really thought for the price it would be good , absolute rubish ! Want full refund
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for dust
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight but if you want to use it in anything other than dust forget it. I have a chinchilla and wanted something to hover up his discarded food and droppings which are tiny dry little droppings. As you can see from the video it will suck up a dropping for a second then it drops back out. Doesn’t seem to have enough suction to get anything past the bend in the hose. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: carolinelee10

customer_reviews.title: It is useless
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are cleaning up somewhat big objects from a flat non-sticky surface, it is useless. Cannot pick up dust or dirt, cannot pick up from carpets. The suction just makes it not worth it. Also it is crazy loud.
customer_reviews.author: l8machine

customer_reviews.title: Handy for the stairs
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and perfect for the stairs. However, the suction is not great. I had to go over the stairs twice before I was satisfied. On the plus side, it is better than dragging the big hoover up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, especially for the size. I use in caravan, so perfect size for that. Just wish the battery life was better.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for what I wanted it for....
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for the smaller quick jobs, saves pulling out a big hoover but fairly noisy.......
customer_reviews.author: Bargain hunter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Wow, we all love this. Gentle enough to de-crumb the boys after eating toast, but powerful enough to Hoover the stairs. The battery life could be longer
customer_reviews.author: Miss S Cook

customer_reviews.title: Well recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic does my car, my home,carpets, hard floors above doors, fabric. Can’t complain
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is a must have for the home and car. It's so light yet powerful. I have bought hand held hoovers in the past and have been highly disappointed but not with this one.
customer_reviews.author: skyalabama

customer_reviews.title: versitile
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant addition to any home, I chose this model because of the hose it makes the hoover very versitile, good for the home and great for the car, exellent value for money, I would recomend this type because other fixed head models dont cut it for me.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN HILL

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Only down side is the run time 9-10 mins at best.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I this easier to use than the standard hand held vacuums. Reasonable operating time but like all lithium iron batteries takes some time to recharge. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chessiepeake

customer_reviews.title: Compact size and easy to carry so very portable
customer_reviews.text: seems to work well on first use. Time will only tell. Compact size and easy to carry so very portable.
customer_reviews.author: david clarke

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily rather than hauling the vacuum cleaner around.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Smart

customer_reviews.title: for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Weaker than i thought it would be. kind of like a toy hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it use it all the time first class service from all
customer_reviews.author: Sir Richard Beeson

customer_reviews.title: sent it back got replacement and very happy.
customer_reviews.text: First one i got wasn't charging properly,sent it back got replacement and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: caroline duff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A most useful piece of equipment that is light and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all the reviews before i purchased this black and decker hoover I looked at the poor reviews and the excellent reviews and decided to purchase and it turned out to be a really good buy put it charge then hooverd the car picked up everything dose what it says and it has very good suction.
customer_reviews.author: joseph short

customer_reviews.title: Easy to empty
customer_reviews.text: This does what I want it to: dust round the TV, crumbs round the toaster, tumble dryer, mats in the car. It's no Dyson but does the job. Short flexible hose makes it a little more versatile than a bog standard dust buster. Easy to empty, filter lifts out - used a Dyson to suck that clean :). A less clunky off/on switch would be an advantage, as would a docking station to charge it. Inserting the charging plug is a bit fiddly. Hence 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Magic1948

customer_reviews.title: its ok not a lot for your money but ok ...
customer_reviews.text: its ok not a lot for your money but ok for what I need it for x
customer_reviews.author: aann kennedynn kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent. Suction not great but adequate. Longer battery life would be a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Black & Decker Lithium Flexi Vac, 10.8 V, Metallic Red by Black & Decker
